column5: Our fully updated 2 bedroom-2 1/2 bath townhome with a private one car garage and a large patio deck, is centrally located in a quiet condo community in the desirable Lakewood area of Dallas just blocks from White Rock Lake, the gem of Dallas, & the Santa Fe biking trail. Located just minutes from the Dallas Arboretum, Deep Ellum, Lower Greenville, Baylor Hospital, and Downtown, it is convenient to everything.
